### Generic riverbank filtrate model

```{r Generic_model}
bear1d_Generic_combined <- kwb.1dbear::calculate_bear1d(
  n_values = 0.3,
  rs_values = 2.65,
  foc_values = 0.002,
  log_koc_values = c(1, 4),
  hl_values = c(120, 600),
  D_values = 2,
  v_values = 1,
  t_values = seq(0, 1000, by = 1),
  x_values = 50
)

# Combine the plots
Generic_combined <- kwb.1dbear::plot_combined(bear1d_Generic_combined)

print(Generic_combined$plot)

# Generate heat map
log_koc_values <- seq(0.1, 6, length.out = 100)
hl_values <- seq(1, 800, length.out = 100)


bear1d_Generic_heatmap <- kwb.1dbear::calculate_bear1d(
  n_values = 0.3,
  rs_values = 2.65,
  foc_values = 0.002,
  log_koc_values = log_koc_values,
  hl_values = hl_values,
  D_values = 2,
  v_values = 1,
  x_values = 50
)

print(kwb.1dbear::plot_heatmap(bear1d_Generic_heatmap,
                               rect_data = Generic_combined$rect_data,
                               measured_C_C0 = 0.73))
```
